item.title: Javascript Clock
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

<html>
    <head>
        <title>Pplsuqbawlz -> Text free, image free, cross-browser, mini-clock.</title>
        <style>
        body {
            background-color: #333333;
            color: #cccccc;
            font-family: Verdana;
            font-size: 10px;
        }
        
        div {
	background-color: #fff;
	overflow: hidden;
	position: absolute;
            width: 1px;
            height: 1px;              
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <script type="text/javascript">
	var fix = document.all ? 0 : 1;
	var num = new Array(10);
	num[0] = "111101101101111";
	num[1] = "001001001001001";
	num[2] = "111001111100111";
	num[3] = "111001011001111";
	num[4] = "101101111001001";
	num[5] = "111100111001111";
	num[6] = "111001111101111";
	num[7] = "111001001010010";
	num[8] = "111101111101111";
	num[9] = "111101111001001";
	
	var basex = 15;
	var basey = 15;
	var date = new Date();
	var ms = new String(date.getHours());
	for(var y = 0; y < ms.length; y++) {
		for(var x = 0; x < 15; x++) {
			if(num[ms.charAt(y)].charAt(x) == "1") {
				document.write("<div style="top: " + Math.abs(((x-fix)/3) + basey) + "px; left: " + ((x%3) + basex) + "px;"></div>");
			}
		}
		basex += 4;
	}
	basex += 4;

	var ms = new String(date.getMinutes());
	for(var y = 0; y < ms.length; y++) {
		for(var x = 0; x < 15; x++) {
			if(num[ms.charAt(y)].charAt(x) == "1") {
				document.write("<div style="top: " + Math.abs(((x-fix)/3) + basey) + "px; left: " + ((x%3) + basex) + "px;"></div>");
			}
		}
		basex += 4;
	}
	basex += 4;

	var ms = new String(date.getSeconds());
	for(var y = 0; y < ms.length; y++) {
		for(var x = 0; x < 15; x++) {
			if(num[ms.charAt(y)].charAt(x) == "1") {
				document.write("<div style="top: " + Math.abs(((x-fix)/3) + basey) + "px; left: " + ((x%3) + basex) + "px;"></div>");
			}
		}
		basex += 4;
	}
	basex += 4;



    </script>
</body>
</html>

Super sexy mini clock.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 24, 2006, 06:34:57 am[/size][hr]36 pixels wide
5 pixels high

MAX. :-p Cool huh?

Read full topic
